trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> object in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的组件编辑器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref>中关联对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> object in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control at design time, under the control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor 类提供一个用户界面以进行编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>中关联对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件在设计时，受控制的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: There is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 没有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>与关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> object is used to apply styles to static submenu items that depend on their level (nesting depth) in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>对象用于将样式应用于依赖于其菜单结构中的级别 （嵌套深度） 的静态子菜单项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor is invoked, for example, by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelSubMenuStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor 调用时，例如，通过选择省略号按钮 (**...**) 上**LevelSubMenuStyles**行中**属性**的可视化设计器的网格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>方法始终返回`false`以指示可以在编辑器中的一次选择该只有一个对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> method creates a new form to display and edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>方法创建一个新的窗体来显示和编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>方法创建指定的集合项类型的新实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>方法返回的编辑器可以创建的类型数组。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> class when you select, for example, the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelSubMenuStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control or a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>类的新实例，当你选择，例如，省略号按钮 (**...**) 上**LevelSubMenuStyles**行中**属性**可视化设计器设计的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件或从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>派生的控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>时网格</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the collection to edit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>编辑集合的</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multiple <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> elements can be selected in the editor at one time.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否多个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref>在编辑器中可以一次选择元素。

trans-unit.source: The CanSelectMultipleInstances method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: CanSelectMultipleInstances 方法始终返回`false`; 因此，只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>对象可以在中的一次选择<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new form to display and edit the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的窗体来显示和编辑当前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The CreateCollectionForm method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> base method to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> form, and then formats a caption for the form.
trans-unit.target: CreateCollectionForm 方法调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>基方法来创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>窗体中，并设置格式窗体的标题。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm> to use as the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>要用作<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定的集合项类型的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The CreateInstance method is used to create new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: CreateInstance 方法用于创建新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: The CreateInstance calls the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method to access the activation methods for late-bound support.
trans-unit.target: CreateInstance 调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>方法来访问后期绑定支持的激活方法。</xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the item to create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要创建的项。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified type, which should be <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的类型应为的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data types that this collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: 获取此集合编辑器可以创建的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor> object can create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> type objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>对象可以创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>类型对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
trans-unit.target: 数据类型的类型数组<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollectionEditor"></xref>可以创建。
